author: noble
msg: latest patch applied to trunk for SOLR-5473 SOLR-5474

author: rpopma
msg: LOG4J2-539: Fixed issue with "Reconfigure using XML below" function in JMX Client GUI.
ConfigurationSource is now a top-level class and can be obtained with Configuration.getConfigurationSource().
LoggerContext.getConfiguration().getConfigurationSource() provides a reliable public method for obtaining a logger context's configuration location and content.

author: ggregory
msg: Javadoc fixes for Java 8. Replace badly formed HTML "<tt>Foo<tt/>" with "{@code Foo}".

author: rmuir
msg: fix off-by-one in checkBufferSize, it must be >= 8
